item.title: Amanu add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Amanu add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Amanu add a quote by Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
item.description: "Joy is the infallible sign of the presence of God." -- Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

item.title: Amanu add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Between a high, solid wall and an egg that breaks against it, I will always stand on the side of the egg." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Amanu add a quote by Octavia E. Butler
item.description:
"All that you touch You Change.
All that you Change Changes you.
The only lasting truth is Change.
God is Change." -- Octavia E. Butler
